content.en_US:
Process of cracking liquids into their components, similar to the [[catalytic cracking tower|Catalytic Cracking Tower]], in the [[radiolysis chamber|RTG and Radiolysis Chamber]]. Fluids must be supplied from outside, similar to the cracking tower. Process can be faster with strong RTG pellets.

Additionally, water can be radiolysed to produce [[hydrogen|Liquid Hydrogen]] and [[hydrogen peroxide|Hydrogen Peroxide]].
